document.discussion_title: Watch LCD Soundsystem Cover Prince's 'Controversy' at Coachella 2016
document.topic_text: Coachella's second weekend featured no shortage of Prince tributes, and headliner LCD Soundsystem delivered one of the first night's most memorable covers on the main stage. Swathed in purple light, the reunited Brooklyn band treated the Coachella crowd to a powerful rendition of the late pop star's "Controversy." Coachella 2016 Friday Weekend 2 Recap: Prince Tributes by LCD Soundsystem, Jack U, Ellie Goulding & More As they had done the first weekend, the James Murphy-fronted outfit also paid tribute to David Bowie by covering "Heroes." Check out videos of the Prince tribute below: A video posted by Jeff miller (@jeffmillerla) on Apr 22, 2016 at 11:39pm PDT Epic purple moment @lcdsoundsystem "Controversy" #coachella A video posted by Mimi Xu (@mistyrabbitmusic) on Apr 23, 2016 at 3:17am PDT More purple tonight. Friday's @coachella headliner @lcdsoundsystem paying homage to the late @prince by covering "Controversy" -- #ripprince #lcdsoundsystem #coachella #kroq A video posted by The World Famous KROQ (@kroq) on Apr 23, 2016 at 12:23am PDT LCD Soundsystem paid tribute to his Purple Majesty with an awesome cover of Controversy #RIPPrince #lcdsoundsystem A video posted by @fungaishon on Apr 23, 2016 at 3:20am PDT #controversy #lcdsoundsystem #prince #coachella -- A video posted by Michele Manz (@michelemanz) on Apr 23, 2016 at 2:54am PDT
